jd: From: Roshan singh yadav, Tek Inspirations roshan.yadav@tekinspirations.com Reply to: roshan.yadav@tekinspirations.com Hi,Hope you are doing well.Have a look at role. Let me know your view. Job Description - Duration: 12+ months MOI: SKYPE (NEED ONLY 4-5 PAGES RESUME, GOOD COMMUNICATION SKILLS) This position is for up to 12 months, with the option of extension, and is in Nashville, TennesseeWe are looking for senior-level database administrator with advanced expertise in both Oracle and PostgreSQL, along with a deep understanding of database architectures, security principles, and performance tuning methodologies. The candidate should also have strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work under pressure while managing multiple complex database systems.
